body:
I can't wait for this to be completed... 
Will I really die if I ask for translations :^)
Faaaaaaaaack gender bender was a turn -off good job otherwise
This is awesome...I definitely gotta see how this ends.
A really good story can't wait for the rest of it

Good stuff. I love the contest between them. It felt like it could go either way even if the more likely result was Ash breaking down. Giselle is a well-realized inhuman character. I like how petty she was being. 

Ash could have cheated the game by trying to kill himself, forcing Giselle to heal him. Even if the trick failed he would still get an ending he want.

Let me finish that sentence friend... OH GOD DIS IS TOO GOOD!

Can't wait for the last part, and before i forget insert obligatory "Still a better love story than twilight"
